member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.MongoReader.MongoReaderPlugin.GridFS
member.summary: A reference to the GridFS instance used to retrieve files.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.MongoReader.MongoReaderPlugin.VirtualFilesystemPrefix
member.summary: Requests starting with this path will be handled by this virtual path provider. Should be in app-relative form: "~/gridfs/". Will be converted to root-relative form upon assigment. Trailing slash required, auto-added.
